title: Uh, the new, uh, president
author: VD
content_html:
This is going to be an amusing four years….

Are you prepared to take the oath, Senator?

I am.

I, Barrack Hussein Obama-

I, Barra….

Do solemnly swear

I, Barrack Hussein Obama, do solemnly swear

That I will execute the office of President to the United States faithfully

That I will execute….(frown, blank look)

In the interest of sheer comedy, Obama should never be permitted the use of a teleprompter again. And it’s 43 presidents, Mr. President. 43. Remember that whole Bush ’41 and ’43 thing? That was the guy you just replaced.
content_text:

an amusing four years
….
Are you prepared to take the oath, Senator?
I am.
I, Barrack Hussein Obama-
I, Barra….
Do solemnly swear

That I will execute the office of President to the United States faithfully
That I will execute….(frown, blank look)
In the interest of sheer comedy, Obama should never be permitted the use of a teleprompter again.  And it’s 43 presidents, Mr. President.  43.  Remember that whole Bush ’41 and ’43 thing?  That was the guy you just replaced.
